Greensboro.Buffalo Presbyterian Church and Cemetery: Buffalo Presbyterian Church and Cemetery is a historic Presbyterian church complex and cemetery located at 800 and 803 Sixteenth Street in Greensboro Guilford County, North Carolina. The Federal-style church sanctuary was built in 1827, and updated and expanded in 1919-1920 in the Colonial Revival style by architect Harry Barton (1876-1937). It was expanded again in 1956.
